Actually it was an accident at first. I didn't plan anything like that originally, but it came out interesting, ha-ha-ha. Eh, you don't believe me anyway.
Of course I don't!
You know, if we went to bathe together, you wouldn't found out about their presence.
What's the difference in if I know or not, if they are still there and looking at me...
(Right, I had that strange feeling that I someone was watching me...)
So keep in mind: if they bother you, I'm always ready to soap your back. Heh-heh-heh.
Your next attempt will end in another failure.
Heh-heh-heh, then I'll wait.
Why are you such a filthy pervert?
You're too lovely to think of you in another context!
Now though we are heading straight to them.
Well, here we are. Want to say hello to your friends? I think they've been waiting for you.
After Stukov's words one of the overseers appeared right next to Sarah.
(You're back, Sarah, we are glad to see you.)
Yeah... good to see you too...
(We are grateful that you brought her to us.)
Hahaha, you've slightly misunderstood us. She wanted to come to you, I had nothing to do with it.
(It's amazing, how extraordinary and remarkable Sarah is.)
(There's nothing remarkable about it... ahh... they consider perversions remarkable, don't they...)
(But this time you came without your armour. Has something terrible happened?)
(Had someone dared to disobey Mistress and attack you? No, this can not be. We control the entire perimeter, nothing like that could happen.)
Yeah, Sarah. Tell us what happened to you. Where's your armorsuit?
I'm not the only one without clothes here, you know...
(Stukov often walks around the ship naked. Even more often than in clothing. We know it is common on Earth.)
(What the hell did this idiot tell them...)
Everything is all right, it's just another exercise... that's all.
(Amazing! Are you going through the same training, Stukov told us about?)
Eh?!
What trainings have you told them about?
(What the crap has he told them?!)
(He told us about Terran special training, that is not practiced by every Terran, but only the special ones. That is how we realized that you were special, Sarah.)
(We saw a lot of intelligences. We have not seen such training before.)
(They are not special in any way... they are just perverts who like showing off their body in public places...)
(We are glad that we were able to see it with our own eyes.)
Sarah won't let you get bored, she's special in all respects, heh-heh-heh.
(We immediately realized that as soon as she boarded the vessel.)
Don't listen to this pervert, he's telling you complete nonsense!
(Why would he? He has no motive to deceive us.)
Oh Sarah, why are you saying such terrible things? Really, why would I ever tell a lie to them?
Stukov's famous smirk was well settled on his face. Sarah knew well enough what he was up to.
(He has one enormous motive! Twist the truth and make me look like a pervert...)
Debugg: Дальше будет момент с вариации название мастурбации, так что я дам возможность выбрать кастомное название, чтобы проверить все вариации.
Call things as they are called!
Let's not change anything...
(Tell us, how your training is going. We are [masturbation_name!t] today, right?)
No! Not today...
Ha-ha-ha-ha. Wow!!!
And you're calling me out on telling nonsense!
Shut up, I had a good reason...
Yes, I can imagine what kind of reason it was!
(That's a pity. We are always happy to help you. Then maybe Stukov can show us how to use the special weapon of the Terrans?)
W-what???
(What is the weapon they are talking about?)
*Ahem* It is a very special weapon and should be used with caution.
(We remember, you told us about it. But now is a great opportunity to demonstrate it.)
What have you been telling them?
*Ahem*, about sooo special weapons!
Are you that much of an idiot???
Ha-ha-ha-ha.
How could they even believe you?..
Hahaha, actually I can shoot it like a real gun. Would you like to see it?
(Yes, show us. We wish to see this particular Terran weapons in action.)
Of course not!
Unfortunately, without Sarah's help I will not be able to use it. This is a very powerful device.
That's not a weapon!
(It's not? Then what is it?)
Heh-heh-heh, really, if it's not a weapon, then what?
That is...
I think that's enough. We will discuss all the details with Sarah and will demonstrate it later.
I'm not discussing anything with you!!!
(Oh, time flies! We thank Sarah again for the visit and hope to learn about the devastating weapons of the Terrans soon.)
(What a shitshow...)
Have they forgot to recover your brain functions when they revived you?
Come on! These guys have a very boring life.
It's still not a reason to make them believe nonsense!
Ahh, come on. I just told them a few interesting things.
But really... think about it.
This thing really can kill a man. Hahaha!
You're such an idiot...
So it's settled! Next time we will conduct field tests of this special weapon in front of them!
STUKOV!!!
Very well, very well...
*Gun cocking sound*
{size=+10}AHAHAHA!!!{/size}
With a roar of laughter Stukov headed towards Sarah's room.
We are staying.
We're going back.
Oh, you want us to stay at your place and engage in truly depraved things? I wholeheartedly approve!
No, that's not what I meant.
Oh, I know, we can improve my collection of holograms! What do you think?
No-no-no. I changed my mind.
Really? What a pity. Well, where shall we go then?
